channel.title: RSS Slideshow RSS Feed
channel.description: This is the default RSS feed used when no URL is specified for an RSS slideshow.

image.title: CNN.com
image.description: RSS Slideshow, displays a slideshow of any RSS feed

item.title: Item 1
item.description: This is the first item in this RSS feed. Also a link to Google.
item.author: Louis Algaze

item.title: Item 2
item.description: Did you know there are many settings that can be modified when launching a slideshow including timing of the items, the type of transitions (although some work better than others), etc.
item.author: louis@algaze.org

item.title: Item 3
item.description: Since RSS Slideshow users an http GET, any of the slideshows can be bookmarked, including all of the settings, and can be lauched from a shortcut.
item.author: Louis the Great

item.title: Item 4
item.description: Images can be placed inline with the text but will only be displayed if the option to "Use HTML in item display" is set to Yes.
item.author: Image of Louis

item.title: Item 6
item.description: Feature suggestions, ideas and kudos can be sent to Louis Algaze.
item.author: The Wonderful Algaze
